SEARCH:
程序包 Entity

类 Account

java.lang.Object
Entity.Account
直接已知子类:
CurrentAccount, SavingAccount
public abstract class Account extends Object
The Account class represents a bank account with basic functionalities such as deposit, withdraw, and interest rate management.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Account

      public Account(String name, double initialBalance, double interestRate)
      Constructs an Account with the specified name, initial balance, and interest rate.
      参数:
      name - the name of the account
      initialBalance - the initial balance of the account
      interestRate - the interest rate of the account

    • Account

      public Account()
      Constructs an Account with an initial balance of zero.

  • 方法详细资料

    • setInterestRate

      public void setInterestRate(double interestRate)
      Sets the interest rate for the account.
      参数:
      interestRate - the new interest rate

    • deposit

      public void deposit(double amount)
      Deposits the specified amount into the account.
      参数:
      amount - the amount to deposit

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw(double amount) throws InsufficientFundsException
      Withdraws the specified amount from the account.
      参数:
      amount - the amount to withdraw
      抛出:
      InsufficientFundsException - if the amount exceeds the current balance

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the name of the account.
      参数:
      name - the new name of the account

    • getBalance

      public double getBalance()
      Gets the current balance of the account.
      返回:
      the current balance

    • getInterestRate

      public double getInterestRate()
      Gets the interest rate of the account.
      返回:
      the interest rate

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the name of the account.
      返回:
      the name of the account

    • calculateInterest

      public abstract void calculateInterest()
      Abstract method to calculate interest for the account. Subclasses must provide an implementation for this method.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
